title: The Shootout Solution
description: Jasper Fforde meets Leverage. The Genrenauts travel across dimensions to the worlds where genres live, fixing off-track stories to protect our Earth.Leah Tang just died on stage. Not literally. Not yet.Leah's stand-up career isn't going well. But she understands the power of fiction, and when she's offered employment with the mysterious Genrenauts Foundation, she soon discovers that literally dying on stage is a hazard of the job! Her first job takes her to a Western world. When a cowboy tale slips off its rails, and the outlaws start to win, it's up to Leah - and the Genrenauts team - to nudge the story back on track and prevent major ripples on Earth.But the story's hero isn't interested in winning, and the safety of Earth hangs in the balance...
author: Michael R. Underwood
